title: B.S. Report - Brian Windhorst
description: ESPN's Brian Windhorst calls in to talk about how Kevin Love fits on the Cavilers, LeBron and David Blatt's relationship, and Cleveland's odds going into the playoffs.
itunes:title: B.S. Report - Brian Windhorst
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: ESPN's Brian Windhorst calls in to talk about how Kevin Love fits on the Cavaliers, LeBron and David Blatt's relationship, and Cleveland's odds going into the playoffs.
